concept.title: 5323.803 Policy

li.p: (a) Requiring activities must obtain approval in accordance with AFI 32-7086 , Hazardous Materials Management, Chapter 3, before a specification or standard that requires the use of a class I ozone-depleting substance (ODS), or that can be met only through the use of an ODS, is authorized in any solicitation or contract/order.
